segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let's start with some basic info. Can you tell me your first name and last name?
segments.client_message: Yeah, it's, uh, Jenny Smith. Just Jenny, you know? I don't use my, my full name much.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Jenny! And what about your date of birth? Just month and day will be fine for now.
segments.client_message: Sure, I was born on 15-05, uh, May 15th, um, nineteen eighty-five, if that helps!
